org.lafayette.server.web.http.digest

Class Digest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lafayette.server.web.http.digest.Digest

  • public final class Digest
extends Object
    Helper to generate HTTP digest authentication responses. Format is: 
     $RESPONSE = md5(
                  md5( username + ":" + realm + ":" + password ) +    // User data.
                  ":" + nonce + ":" +
                  md5( httpMethod + ":" + requestedUri )              // Request data.
             )
    Server response header: 
     HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized
 WWW-Authenticate: Digest real="Private Area", nonce="IrTfjizEdXmIdlwHwkDJx0"
 ...
    Client Request: 
     GET / HTTP/1.1
 Authorization: Digest username="Foo",
                       realm="Private Area",
                       nonce="IrTfjizEdXmIdlwHwkDJx0",
 ,                     httpMethod="GET",
                       uri="/",
                       response="$RESPONSE"
 ...
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

      Generates authentication digest from request parameters.

      Generates md5 hash in hex (authentication digest) from hashed userdata, NONCE, and hashed request data.
      static String digestRequestData(String httpMethod, String requestedUri)
      Generates md5 hash in hex from request data.
      static String digestUserData(String username, String password, String realm)
      Generates md5 hash in hex from user data.

    • Method Detail

      • digestUserData

        public static String digestUserData(String username,
                    String password,
                    String realm)
        Generates md5 hash in hex from user data. Format: md5( username : realm : password )
        Parameters:
        username - must not be null
        password - must not be null
        realm - must not be null
        Returns:
        never null or empty

      • digestRequestData

        public static String digestRequestData(String httpMethod,
                       String requestedUri)
        Generates md5 hash in hex from request data. Format: md5( httpMethod : requestedUri)
        Parameters:
        httpMethod - must not be null
        requestedUri - must not be null
        Returns:
        never null or empty

      • digest

        public static String digest(String userData,
            String nonce,
            String requetsData)
        Generates md5 hash in hex (authentication digest) from hashed userdata, NONCE, and hashed request data. Format: md5( userData : NONCE : requetsData)
        Parameters:
        userData - must not be null
        nonce - must not be null
        requetsData - must not be null
        Returns:
        never null or empty

        Generates authentication digest from request parameters.
        Parameters:
        params - must not be null
        Returns:
        never null
